item.title: Critical Dell SupportAssist Vulnerability (CVE-2024-52535) Exploited
item.description:
Dell announced a critical security vulnerability affecting its SupportAssist software, widely used for system diagnostics and updates on Dell PCs. Identified as CVE-2024-52535, this flaw poses significant risks to cybersecurity experts and end-users. Understanding the Vulnerability Dell SupportAssist versions up to 4.6.1 for Home PCs and up to 4.5.0 for Business PCs contain a symbolic [â€¦]

The post Critical Dell SupportAssist Vulnerability (CVE-2024-52535) Exploited appeared first on SecPod Blog.
